XGroups

There can be different groups required for a project, like, specific user type like developers, QA, administrators and so on. You can add the groups necessary for the project and then apply them to the specific user. These users will have different rights and policies for application usage.

Adding new groups

To add new groups that you would need for different users of your project ,

  1. Select the XGroups entity. The xgroups list window is displayed.
  2. Select Add. The Add xgroups window is displayed.
  3. Enter Name and Description for the specific group. These fields are mandatory. Description text box missing right now
  4. Click Save. The new role is now added to your project.

Deleting groups

If any group or groups are to be removed, you can delete them from the list using Delete function.

To delete a group:

  1. Under XGroups list, click to select the group to be deleted.
  2. Click Delete. The selected group is deleted. Multiple groups can be deleted if you select multiple groups from the list.

    Note:

    1. In case you do not select a group, an error message is displayed stating â€œXGroup not selectedâ€�.

Editing group details

You can edit the details for a specific group including the policies, applications and visibilities to be applied to the groups and the roles. The following entities / functionalities can be applied.

To edit the group details, under xgroups list, select the group from the list and click Edit. The Edit xgroups window appears. Using the edit function, the following entities / functionalities can be applied:

  1. Applications verify this list
  2. Visibilities
  3. Policies

Refresh

For all entities you will be able to Refresh that page to reflect the latest data and functions applicable for the entity.
